GSD.product_version: versions from v5.9 to before v5.15.53
GSD.description:
xen-netfront: restore __skb_queue_tail() positioning in xennet_get_responses()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.53 by commit 1052fc2b7391a43b25168ae69ad658fff5170f04, it was introduced in version v5.9 by commit 6c5aa6fc4defc2a0977a2c59e4710d50fa1e834c. For more details please see the references link.
